name: Open Course
description:
Fun Exciting Island Golf! Test your ability on this challenging island golf course, where precision is needed for each shot! Hours of casual fun!!!

1-9 Greens: Fairways have different islands to land on, opening up different paths to the hole.

1-4 Players: - Host and client screen, the host has options (disband, remove player), and the client can join and leave the game at any time.

Shots: Watch players take their luck at the perfect shot!

Ball Stats: Player Name, Yards to Hole, Ground Target Distance, Ball Hit Distance, Ball Hit Degrees, and Power-bar

Scoreboard: The scoreboard will keep track of the player's scores while competing.

Show/Hide Options: Group List, Scoreboard, Mouse Cursor

Winner: A final scoreboard will display the winner, with the ability to
mark play again or go to the main menu.

Host Final Screen: The host can decide to play again or go to the main menu.

Players Joining: Players can join in the client lobby screen, join in between holes (before any hits, the player's score will start from that hit), or join at the end (on the winner screen).
